content.name: migrationObject
content.description: Information about the storage resources that reside on a remote storage system that are either migrating to local system or are potential migration candidates.

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the object from source system as available on this system.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the object from source system as available on this system. Format is:         SystemSerial:ObjectID

attributes.name: remoteID
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the object as is from the source system.

attributes.name: remoteSystem
attributes.description: System this resource belongs to, as defined by remoteSystem type.

attributes.name: members
attributes.description: List of member objects in the resource. For a CG, list of member LUNs. For VDM, list of member File Systems.

attributes.name: filesystemInfo
attributes.description: Details of File System type object.
